website_summaries.verdict: An all-natural spray that excels at protecting pets and family while eliminating pests.
pros: With 100% natural ingredients, this is the best option for peace-of-mind and protecting your pets
Customers love the pleasant smell and the fact that the spray kills on contact
cons: This spray is not very effective against ticks

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best stuff and all natural! I used frontline plus and advantix in the past, only for my dogs to still get ticks. I have only found 1 tick on 1 of my dogs (I have 3) all summer & I live in the northeast (CT) where the deer tick problem is high! You can even spray it on furniture! The scent can be a bit strong when you have multiple animals, but well worth it because it works & it is natural! It is truly fabulous & I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Venturelli

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Smells good (really), and repels all kinds of little beasties. I would probably not use it in a high enough amounts to see if it actually kills fleas on my dog, though. Smaller animals can only tolerate moderate amounts of clove. But it's been a really good repellent for my ankles and neck...and for my pup as an extra deterrent to fleas and ticks (I also use Nexguard on her). Neither of us has brought in a tick since I started using it, and biting flies no long buzz around my head while walking in the woods.
customer_reviews.author: Scorpiette

customer_reviews.title: Smells good.
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of this stuff! I love the smell and I love the fact that it's all natural. Unfortunately, it doesn't do much for my dog's fleas. She's relieved from fleas for about a day and then she's back to scratching again. I followed directions and I sprayed her every two days and it still didn't make a difference. Disappointed because I had high hopes for this.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Fleas are gone
customer_reviews.text: Very good spray: effective and it doesn't smell bad. Our dog had special medicine and didn't have fleas, but they still lived on the second floor in carpets. It was a disaster: 5-10 fleas would jump on me, when I go upstairs😳. I used this spray several times, and they are gone. I would suggest to buy a gallon, because small bottle is not enough to get rid of these terrible creatures. Also, I would suggest to use it regularly during curtain period, not celebrating victory too soon, because they appear again in several days. Good luck, flea fighters!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Kislitsyna

customer_reviews.title: Product smells like clove which is far nicer than any chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: Product smells like clove which is far nicer than any chemical smell. Cats aren't wild about smell. Had several small kittens (farrow) covered in fleas and felt sorry for them. sprayed them. fleas gone within two days. Not sure how often I will have to spray but this gave them some relief. I would recommend product.
customer_reviews.author: Denny

customer_reviews.title: Not strong enough to do anything?
customer_reviews.text: Has a pleasant odor - I've only used this one time, but noticed right away that this must be a water based product, the fragrance rapidly evaporating with the product. Another brand I'd used previously seemed to really be comprised of essential oils, left a bit of an oily residue in the fur and the fragrance lasted considerably longer. It would seem if it was going to discourage fleas and other critters, it would need to be more like the latter.
customer_reviews.author: R. J. Mills

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work
customer_reviews.text: It seems to keep the bugs away. I put it in another bottle that sprays better and I can see through the bottle and it looks like the ingredients are separated so I hope it still works when I start using it in the spring again. I shake it well but chunks are still floating. I would rather use this stuff than chemicals to protect my pet.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Parthridge

customer_reviews.title: Smells awful but seems to be effective
customer_reviews.text: The ticks this spring have been overwhelming. We hike 6 to 9 dogs every morning in the coast range of Oregon, and we were pulling several ticks off each dog afterwards despite using the standard toxic preventative. We added Dr. Greenpet to the arsenal and spray each dog lightly before every outing. The smell is really ghastly - our dogs hate it too - but we are finding zero to maybe one or two ticks on each dog now. So we will keep on using it, because anything is worth ending up with fewer ticks hitching a ride on our gang.
customer_reviews.author: Kyra Collins

customer_reviews.title: Used on my dogs and I noticed in my boxer ...
customer_reviews.text: Used on my dogs and I noticed in my boxer that he stopped biting his butt A LOT more than he was so that's a plus. This morning there was a HUGE flea on the bed (where they sleep) and I sprayed it to see how it does on direct contact. I was proud to say the flea was dead within 35-40 seconds after direct spraying. I hope it works this well on my babies!
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Lee Carnes

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with the product. It definitely keeps the fleas away but not sure if its killing them..
customer_reviews.author: Sal W.

customer_reviews.title: Worked good on fleas
customer_reviews.text: Worked good on fleas. We are a little overrun with ticks right now but I hope with time that they will get cleared out.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Long time product user.
customer_reviews.text: Long time user of this product for my indoor/outdoor cat. My cat regularly goes out to an enclosed back yard and with this repellent has never had any ticks, fleas, or any other critter.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Gypsy

customer_reviews.title: so far so good!
customer_reviews.text: thank goodness this isn't toxic.. my dogs all run at the sight of a spray bottle so I spray my hands to put this on them. So far this is working ..
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't repel anything
customer_reviews.text: I've tried using this and gave it a chance, I went through the whole bottle. but this morning I really decided it just doesn't work. I sprayed a good layer of this on my legs, ears, forehead, and neck, basically any exposed skin, and spread it around to cover. Within a minute of going outside I had 4 mosquitoes on one leg, 2 on the other, 1 on each ear, and 2 on my forehead.
customer_reviews.author: Seann

customer_reviews.title: I had high hopes, but it didn't repeal fleas or work at all
customer_reviews.text: I am all for trying natural products with my dogs as I don't like to give them medication such as Comfortis for fleas. I tried this spray with high hopes with 0 results. It does smell really good, however it did not repeal fleas at all. I don't know if those who say they see results with the product just aren't seeing the fleas still on their dogs or what. I can't recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: The Dude

customer_reviews.title: Divine remedy!
customer_reviews.text: It works!! No more fleas in our home. We sprayed it on our Bona mop and mopped all hardwood floors with it. (Our home was built in the 1800s so floorboards are wonky and fleas hide there.) Haven’t seen a flea since then. Also sprayed on our furniture. Smells divine. Hooray!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely does not work. Took the dog for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely does not work. Took the dog for a walk after applying the spray and for the next few days had numerous ticks on our little puppy. Had to take her to the vet because the product did not work and she had tick related fever/disease. Do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Evan Bosworth

customer_reviews.title: The brand I had before this was Richard's Organics I think and that one worked great but the sprayer always broke
customer_reviews.text: I used this and my dog still got ticks. The brand I had before this was Richard's Organics I think and that one worked great but the sprayer always broke. Was looking for a replacement product but I don't think this will be it.
customer_reviews.author: Vin

customer_reviews.title: Prevention only
customer_reviews.text: Ok, but would only use as an extra prevention, definitely would use if a flea infestation has already started
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Keith

customer_reviews.title: Works and smells great!
customer_reviews.text: I sent this to my sister who has a cat that spends a lot of time outside. One day she found a few fleas on him and a couple around her house. She tried this on her cat ,on the furniture and around the house. Within a day she noticed a difference and within a couple days the problem was resolved. She said the smell was great!
customer_reviews.author: abugay

customer_reviews.title: Overpowering smell!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awful Strong smell. Couldn’t take it. Sending back. Gave me a headache!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: It works for a few minutes, however, there ...
customer_reviews.text: It works for a few minutes, however, there is not long term effects with this product. Ended up buying different products in order to get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie L

customer_reviews.title: Great I took my pet out for a walk and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great I took my pet out for a walk and she came back with no bug bites. So glad this is a holistic product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie m

customer_reviews.title: The smell is awesome
customer_reviews.text: We recently had a huge mess with fleas. Due to rescuing 3 feral kittens. They are not completely gone but this product really helped minimizing the fleas on cats and in the house. The smell is amazing and All natural no harsh chemicals .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: It has to be used every couple of days. I’ve switched back to NexGuard. I saw 2 ticks crawling on my dog within hours of using the product. Very disappointed it didn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Walls

customer_reviews.title: Smells like pinol? You know that solution people use for ...
customer_reviews.text: Smells like pinol? You know that solution people use for the floor... Just my opinion. I also texted it and nope... didn’t work, still looking for a natural flea solution ordered 3 more products... hopefully one will work Btw it was about 3/4 full... blah
customer_reviews.author: trevs

customer_reviews.title: Wow this stuff does smell terrific and it really works awesome
customer_reviews.text: Wow this stuff does smell terrific and it really works awesome. Me and my babies are happy and thank you for such fast service.
customer_reviews.author: lucy bentancourt

customer_reviews.title: Works great on killing fleas on contact once sprayed on my ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great on killing fleas on contact once sprayed on my dogs, but once it dries it does mot last long. After many applications fleas are gone, smells great and dogs do not mind the smell or applications
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie L Houser

customer_reviews.title: It does not smell great
customer_reviews.text: It smells like chemicals, very strong. My bottle arrived not sealed, as if the bottle had been previously used or opened. 1/2 of the liquid has spilled.
customer_reviews.author: LucyC

customer_reviews.title: good natural spray
customer_reviews.text: i used it on the dogs & myself- scent is pretty good, spray trigger is easy... doesnt have harmful chemicals in it.
customer_reviews.author: vintage gardens

customer_reviews.title: very nice and good quality
customer_reviews.text: My friend uses this and I loved the scent of cloves. The dog and any furniture you spray smell pleasant and didn't make me stuffy or allergic.
customer_reviews.author: crazywoman

customer_reviews.title: great ingredients but pet may lick it off
customer_reviews.text: I have to keep the cone on my cat from licking it off but as soon as I remove the cone he licks it off right away. However I do think it is keeping the fleas and ticks away. Two weeks in it's a little early to tell
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin King

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: I was very impress with this product. It is all natural and kills all thicks and fleas on my cats and dogs. The smell is nice. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: review

customer_reviews.title: Bottle leaked all over my hand
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how well this works but the bottle was broken or cheaply made and leaked all over my hand while using and I had to basically toss it away. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Quin Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Cats may be allergic
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good product BUT be cautious on using it on your cat. No problems for one of our cats but the other cat had to rushed to the vet from an allergic reaction to the product.
customer_reviews.author: David Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Bottle not sealed and a lot of product leaked out into shipping bag.
customer_reviews.text: Just received item. Disappointed that the bottle was not sealed and about 25% had leaked out into the plastic bag. Also the spray nozzle that came with it was too large for the bottle. Will see if the product works as the reviews of effectiveness are good.
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Lommel

customer_reviews.title: Sprayed great, repelled bugs
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a recent camping trip, our dog is very sensitive to chemicals (shots, traditional tick and flea medication) so we opted to g on the natural route to help prevent bugs. Package arrived in great shape, smelled nice and fresh, the bigger spray nozzle worked great to apply the product faster. We didn’t notice any bugs or mosquitos bothering our Ridgeback so I would say it worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works great!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great! Took my dog out to a place that always returns ticks and he had nothing on him! This stuff works!
customer_reviews.author: sk84life0129

customer_reviews.title: he's not real happy about it
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my cat when he goes out in the yard. I spray a hand towel then wipe him down with it, he's not real happy about it, but it seems to work well, haven't had any bug issues this season with ticks or flees.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Barratt

customer_reviews.title: Nice fresh fragrance
customer_reviews.text: Nice fresh fragrance! Great for your pet and the home as well. I even sprayed some on my own clothing/shoes when I went for a walk with my pet as we live in the woods and are surrounded by pests.
customer_reviews.author: PLZ

customer_reviews.title: so good!
customer_reviews.text: The smell is pleasant and it seems to be keeping the ticks off my dog. She had one on her when she did have the spray on, but it seemed to be trying to get off of her. So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Schell

customer_reviews.title: Maybe trying something else
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I don't think this is going to work for me....sprayed it directly onto a flea and it lived so have avoided putting it on my cats....just wish there was a safe natural product I could use ....doing everything I can to get rid of these pests so my cats can relax.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. My dog hates it but no ticks or ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. My dog hates it but no ticks or fleas! Didn't use it once and found a tick on him. Must use every time I walk him so that why I only gave it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: proud grandma!

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I love the smell and my cat had 0 ticks all summer. I apply 1 time a week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not sure yet
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it a couple times so I can't say much.
customer_reviews.author: C Corto

customer_reviews.title: Spillage during shipping
customer_reviews.text: The inside of the shipping envelope was wet so I measured the bottle contents in a measuring cup and it was 12oz. , short 4oz. of the 16oz. bottle. I hope it works, only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M.

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as Mercola!
customer_reviews.text: I was devoted to Mercola flea spray for years, but when I noticed the ingredients in Dr. Green were identical to Mercola's formula, for a third of the price, I was happy to switch. It has more water than Mercola's formula, but I find it works just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Hur

customer_reviews.title: Apparently not actually for cats
customer_reviews.text: While it does what it is supposed to, my groomer warned me not to put it on my cat. It's good for carpets or even the dog, but they shouldn't put a cat on it if it has this gs harmful to cats
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Great Natural Tick Repellent
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell and keeps ticks off our dog as we live in very wooded area.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells good, works good if...
customer_reviews.text: If you apply this everyday and right before tick infested outings, it will work well. Otherwise it has a very short life on the dog and needs lots of applications. Smells great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sprayed it on the dogs and around the doors and windows. No more tics or fleas.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Flea spray
customer_reviews.text: Smells great! I haven't seen any fleas! Would recommend for pets! Safe and natural. Inexpensive and ships very quickly. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: KaliRue

customer_reviews.title: not sure
customer_reviews.text: smells ok, like that its clean, cant say iyt is or isnt helping with the fleas. lots of water when u spray, gets my dogs fur really wet. a finer mist would be nice
customer_reviews.author: kelly carter

customer_reviews.title: Great product, love that its natural and has given ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, love that its natural and has given our 2 dogs some relief from fleas, I haven't seen any ticks, but works great on keeps fleas off.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Santos

customer_reviews.title: This has work for my dog better than any Natural or flea collar I've tried and ...
customer_reviews.text: This has worked for my dog better than any Natural or flea collar I've tried and I've tried several alternatives. For her it last about 4-5 days. Just reared another bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Karry Winston

customer_reviews.title: Dr. GreenPet All Natural Flea and Tick...
customer_reviews.text: My dog picked up fleas from a neighborhood pet and the yard, This spray, used consistently, has helped bring the problem under control.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Cheney

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work On Ticks!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing this repels is the people around it! The smell is almost too strong. And, I am sorry to say it did not repel or kill ticks, even after I shook and sprayed it directly on a tick.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Loved this product!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if this product works or not cause I can't really see the fleas. But, my dog is scratching less & THUS STUFF SMELLS AMAZING. I sprayed it everywhere cause I was supposed to but then I did it again just b/c it was so fun!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Did what it promised, pet itching is gone, and it smells good, not harsh.
customer_reviews.author: Mary the librarian

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't smell good and let the fur very oily.
customer_reviews.author: SPucci

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and all natural. Perfect if you like to hug and kiss your dogs,no nasty chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: HR.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: didn't work any better than dollartree natural spray(for a dollar)? :(
customer_reviews.author: K. Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, smells great!! Hopefully it will keep the ticks away.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Kranick

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is great so far! I love that it’s all natural and doesn’t smell bad.
customer_reviews.author: ZAM

customer_reviews.title: Not working.
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work for me. Dog has fleas and after using this product, she has even more fleas.
customer_reviews.author: Carole L. Mix

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: My dog still has problem with flea...i dont think this is working on my dog..
customer_reviews.author: Jen Kim

customer_reviews.title: I'm a big fan!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I can whole-heartedly say that we LOVE the way everyone smells! That, in and of itself, is a huge win for our stinky dogs, who for some reason, no dog shampoo can help. We doused them all last night, and what a pleasant odor. Then I noticed this morning, not only was our "itcher" not scratching herself, but her fur is so soft. Also, when I thought I had a problem with my order, (I didn't, it was *my mistake) the company went above and beyond to reach out to me, and my inquiries. Thank you Bronson! Good business!!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Z.

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Seems to repel and kill fleas and also smells very good. A bit spendy but better than the toxic chemical repellent
customer_reviews.author: SCOTT ZIMMERMAN

customer_reviews.title: Product works well.
customer_reviews.text: Works well, and it’s important to me that it’s not toxic to pets.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnne W.

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Great product the smell doesn't brother my pups and I'm super excited to use it for long walks at the park
customer_reviews.author: MissMiracle

customer_reviews.title: Good product except for scent.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2 lb 5 ounce puppy 14 weeks old and couldn't use Frontline because he has to be 5 lbs or more so I chose this flea and tick spray. I like that it's all natural ingredients but not too crazy about the scent.
customer_reviews.author: NJ Beach Girl

customer_reviews.title: Love this. The smell is fresh
customer_reviews.text: Love this. The smell is fresh. My cat has long hair so I had to rub it into his fur.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen A Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Really works great, smells nice
customer_reviews.text: Really works great, smells nice, doesn't feel sticky, I used on myself out camping as well as on the dog!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for us. :-(
customer_reviews.text: Alergic to whatever is in this. Caused my daughter to break out. It did work though.
customer_reviews.author: Rich & Lena H.

customer_reviews.title: Made my cat sick.
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this because I don't like to put chemical flea treatments on my cats. But it made one of my cats sick (I later researched and found that the essential oils in this formula are on the list of oils that can make cats sick). It also didn't get rid of fleas.
customer_reviews.author: Arlette

customer_reviews.title: And it works
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and is not too strong for my dogs! Have not seen a flea.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: The smell is wonderful and my pet doesn't mind it either. We've had a problem with ticks this Spring and I feel very comfortable using this product on my dog's ears and neck.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: This product is wonderful. Gentle on my pet and has helped with ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful. Gentle on my pet and has helped with his dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: non-offensive smell
customer_reviews.text: It seems to work...so far, no little arachnoids! It smells nice, too!

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Works and it has a wonderful scent. My pets love it.
customer_reviews.author: BEVERLY

customer_reviews.title: Kills fleas
customer_reviews.text: It kills fleas but my dog always runs away when she sees me with a spray bottle. She gets scared for some reason. If she would sit still, I could get rid of all her fleas...
customer_reviews.author: Agnes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell! I use it on my dog and all over my house.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: my dog lose his hair am not at all happy

customer_reviews.title: I am not sure if it really works or if ...
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure if it really works or if I am using it correctly. My dog is still itching.
customer_reviews.author: Unpredictable

customer_reviews.title: Not sure yet
customer_reviews.text: I am starting with a 3 star for now. The product smells wonderful. It seems to be helping, just not sure how much yet. So far my cat has had no adverse reaction to the product. She has tolerated being sprayed with it.
customer_reviews.author: Joann L. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: smells awesome! haven't seen any fleas or ticks! also using earth animal flea and tick internal powder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product...smells nice too!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Nice scent. I spray it on my dog, his bed and my couch every few days and have not seen a tick on him in weeks. We were seeing a few ticks a week on him. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: nyjocool

customer_reviews.title: Fleas are really bad this year in AR
customer_reviews.text: Fleas are really bad this year in AR. My indoor cats had them bad. I have severe respiratory issues so using chemicals is out. Your Natural feal control worked very well. Also a tip. I put several small lamps turned on with dishes of soapy water beneath them. The fleas in the carpet would jump at the light and fall into the water and drown. Took a few weeks to kill all of them but got it done w/o chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells nice. So far I didn't find tick on my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: It's pleasant smelling, I have not observed any pests ...
customer_reviews.text: It's pleasant smelling, I have not observed any pests since using. My dog (who has a lot of allergies) tolerates it very well.
customer_reviews.author: Ria

customer_reviews.title: left for work for 3 days and when I came back the house STILL smell like this. It's completely natural and it's working well ...
customer_reviews.text: The smell is truly magical. I sprayed my house, left for work for 3 days and when I came back the house STILL smell like this. It's completely natural and it's working well with fleas.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Ever seen an orange dog?
customer_reviews.text: I just go this product two days ago, and I don't have much to report yet. What I do have to say though, is it turned part of my dog orange. It's very subtle, but I'm afraid she'll look like a carrot if i keep using it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great and safe for both my dog and cat. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Myla

customer_reviews.title: Ripoff
customer_reviews.text: This stuff sucked. After using the spray & pills..Two weeks later I picked a dozen of the bloodsuckers off dogs bed, put them in a baggie. They still kicking 12 hours later. (BIRD)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fleas don't like it but it does not kill them at all
customer_reviews.text: I wish you guys would have said something about some of the ingredients being TOXIC to cats!!! >:C I sprayed my little ones like 3 times already! and wondering why they didn't look too hot for like that whole week. not to mention after all that the fleas where still a problem! if anything happens to my cats I'm going to sue the hats off you pricks...
customer_reviews.author: Vannie Williams

customer_reviews.title: All it does is smell good. Delivery is nice and early but the fleas ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not work in the slightest. All it does is smell good. Delivery is nice and early but the fleas are still terrorizing my dog. I bought this because the ratings were good and it was a natural spray. DO not let the ratings fool you. it does not tackle fleas
customer_reviews.author: karelyn russ

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It does smell good, but that is about all it does, except scare the cat.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: great item
customer_reviews.text: looks true to picture. Great product good value. I love it and you will to as well.
customer_reviews.author: AnnMarie Williams

product_meta.title: Dr GreenPet Flea and Tick Spray for Dogs and Cats 16oz
product_meta.description: Fleas and ticks can cause discomfort for you, your family and your pets and can carry germs and diseases that could make all of you sick, making tick and flea control of the utmost importance. Still ordinary cat flea treatment and dog tick treatment products like collars and medicines can pose risks of their own, as they’re made from chemicals, poisons and toxins. The good news is that there is a completely safe, nontoxic option for flea and tick prevention for dogs and cats--Dr. GreenPet All Natural Flea and Tick Spray is the answer! Dr. GreenPet All Natural Flea and Tick Spray is a 100 percent natural tick and flea spray made from a blend of essential oils and botanical extracts that have been proven to repel fleas and ticks. The scent of the ingredients in our flea & tick spray naturally wards off the pests that can make your dog, cat and family sick without exposing you to toxins and poisons. Compared to other natural cat flea treatment and dog flea treatment products, Dr. GreenPet All Natural Flea and Tick Spray is the best to choose because it's: - TRULY NATURAL. Unlike other flea & tick products that contain just one or two natural ingredients, our flea spray is 100 percent naturally derived. - EASY TO USE. Just spritz our tick and flea control spray wherever you need to! The formula does the rest. - AROMATIC. You'll love the scent of our flea & tick spray! - GUARANTEED. If you're dissatisfied with our spray for flea and tick prevention for dogs and cats, you can return it within 30 days for a full refund. Fight ticks and fleas the natural way with the best flea & tick spray made from natural ingredients! Order Dr. GreenPet All Natural Flea and Tick Spray now. This product has not been registered by the United States Environmental Protection Agency. Dr. GreenPet represents that this product qualifies for 25b exemption from registration under the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act.
feature_bullets: FIGHT FLEAS & TICKS NATURALLY Made with 100% natural ingredients, our tick and flea control spray keeps your pets and your family safe from toxins, poisons and harsh chemicals
MAXIMUM PROTECTION Our blend of premium essential oils and extracts keeps pests away with their scent for effective flea and tick prevention for dogs and cats
PREMIUM QUALITY We manufacture our flea & tick spray in the USA to ensure that it is of the absolute best quality
A WONDERFUL SCENT Unlike an ordinary chemical cat flea treatment or dog tick treatment, our flea & tick spray has a pleasing scent that you'll love
EASY TO USE Our tick and flea spray comes in an easy-to-squeeze spray bottle for fast application wherever you need it
